British Businessmen Arrive
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, chairman of the Global Group, and his party arrived here today.
 They were greeted at the airport by Pak Yong Chil, president of the Koryo Bank, and officials concerned.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Sang Ryon
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Pro. and Dr. Kim Sang Ryon, researcher of the Rice Institute  under the
Academy of Agricultural Science, who was Kim Il Sung Prize winner, Labor Hero of the DPRK, People's Scientist and academician, on June 3 to express a deep condolence over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of CPBM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Chinese Delegation
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met and had a friendly conversation with the friendship delegation of Liaoning
Province, China, led by  Hu Xiaohua, vice-governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 Present there were Ri Kyong Sik, minister of Agriculture, Kye Yong Sam, president of the Academy of Agricultural Science, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Guan Huabing, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Chinese embassy here.    
 On the occasion the head of the delegation he said he witnessed the DPRK attaching importance to agriculture and directing big efforts to it and wished the Korean people greater success in agricultural production this year.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of CPBM
    Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the Communist Party of Bohemia and Moravia (CPBM) led by Miroslav Grevenicek, chairman of its Central Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
